Tyrannosaurus rex.name: Tyrannosaurus rex
Tyrannosaurus rex.description: A fearsome predator with a massive bite force.
Tyrannosaurus rex.fun_fact: Tyrannosaurus rex is the largest land carnivore ever to walk the Earth.

Velociraptor.name: Velociraptor
Velociraptor.description: A small but deadly predator that hunted in packs.
Velociraptor.fun_fact: Velociraptors are often depicted as being much larger than they actually were in popular culture.

Triceratops.name: Triceratops
Triceratops.description: A large, armored dinosaur with a distinctive frill and three horns.
Triceratops.fun_fact: Triceratops is one of the most recognizable dinosaurs in the world.

Stegosaurus.name: Stegosaurus
Stegosaurus.description: A large, armored dinosaur with bony plates on its back and a spiked tail.
Stegosaurus.fun_fact: Stegosaurus had a small brain for its size.

Brachiosaurus.name: Brachiosaurus
Brachiosaurus.description: A giant dinosaur with a long neck and long tail.
Brachiosaurus.fun_fact: Brachiosaurus was the tallest dinosaur ever to walk the Earth.
